remarks: The restriction of the category of non-unital rings to the set of unital ring homomorphisms is the category of unital rings.  (Contributed by AV, 16-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rhmsubcrngc.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rhmsubcrngc.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rhmsubcrngc.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Ring i^i U ) ) $.
rhmsubcrngc.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( RingHom |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
rngcresringcat $p |- ( ph -> ( C |`cat H ) = ( RingCat ` U ) ) $.
